name: Variable folders
description: Adds folders to the Variables category. To create a folder, right click any variable in the block palette and click "Add to folder". Right click a variable in a folder to move it to another folder or remove it from its folder. Right click a folder to rename or delete it (removing all variables from the folder, but not the variables themselves). This feature works by adding "[folderName] " at the beginning of the names for your variables.

info.text: Users with this addon enabled will be able to see the folders in your project. Anyone else will see variable lists normally (no folders).
